    "data": "2,3,5,83,263,5333,5333,6714497,42360737,3757699889,3757699889,1431898413161,5654774136689",
    "name": "Initial prime of a prime chain of length n under the iteration x->5x+4.",
    "comment": [
        "This is a special case of prime chains generated by f(x) = cx + d.",
        "a(12) > 10551875981. [From _Donovan Johnson_, Sep 27 2008]"
    ],
    "reference": [
        "D. H. Lehmer, On certain chains of primes, Proc. London Math. Soc. (3) 14a 1965 183-186."
    ],
    "example": [
        "a(3) = 5 since 5, f(5) = 29 and f(29) = 149 are primes when f(x) = 5x+4."
    ],
    "mathematica": [
        "t[p_] := Block[{c=1, q = 5*p+4}, While[ PrimeQ@q, q = 5*q + 4; c++]; c]; a[n_] := Block[{p = 2}, While[t[p] < n, p = NextPrime@ p]; p]; Array[a, 8] (* _Giovanni Resta_, Mar 21 2017 *)"
    ],
    "xref": [
        "Cf. A057330, A057331, A083388, A084954, A084955, A084956, A084957, A084958, A084959, A084961."
    ],

        "a(12)-a(13) from _Giovanni Resta_, Mar 21 2017"
